main event: Four dimly lit triangular shaped objects were observed traveling slowly from West to East in Hungary.
interesting points: The objects had a bright spot in the center and formed a square in an apparently horizontal plane., The altitude of the objects was estimated to be about 3,000 meters., The objects rotated slowly around the center as if connected., There was no noise, exhaust, or vapor trail observed during the sighting., The weather was clear and visibility was 100% during the observation.
sighted object: four triangular objects with bright spots
